edited_stories.edited_story_text: In the city, a man made his arrival. Excited with prospect, he gleefully went about, sight-seeing all that there was around him. He toured the city, observing the great monuments and being captivated by the sheer height of some of the buildings downtown. He was both dumbfounded and satisfied that he was able to complete his tour.
